page.title: 14BONFIRE NIGHT
page.content: The Gt. Canfield Society organises Bonfire Night at Marsh Farm. Large bonfire about 20 ft. high; fine fire works display. Event is normally held on Saturday nearest Nov. 5 (Guy Fawkes Night). Safety is important. Several members of society have taken a course in safety. Display is isolated by rope barrier and straw bales which act as seats. A bar, set up in a barn, and a barbeque form background to the event. Fireworks are expensive and a large audience is attracted, so a profitable show must be put on. Purchasing fireworks and food and running the bar need detailed organisation so that profit is made. In recent years this has gone toward upkeep of the village Church.
